description:
The story takes place at the subsequent era after the whole world was devastated by the nuclear war. Under the strong rule by the World Empire, people are all suppressed and deprived of their own lives. A resistance team secretly keeps fighting to break the suppression while everyone is forbidden to possess any force of arms.
The team challenges the fight with the "antique guns" that were left as works of art, and the incarnations of those antique guns are called "Musketeers" appear and join the team, as if they responded to the soul of the team.
In their battles with the incarnations of contemporary guns who represent and are dispatched from the Empire, the "Musketeers" turn their "Absolute Noble" mode to give a powerful boost to themselves, and bring hope to the world!

(Source: Marvelous)

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Dystopian
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a society characterized by poverty, squalor or oppression.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

title.native: 千銃士 貴銃士たちのハッピーバースデイ!

name.native: スプリングフィールド

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/331643934) | [Website](http://mazurka.moo.jp/)

While studying for a university degree in art, she was discovered by web artists [Shingo Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/114914/) and [Kenichi Kutsuna](https://anilist.co/staff/116007/), who recruited her to work on [Birdy Decode](https://anilist.co/anime/3974/). She did not join any particular studio, but started her career as a freelancer.
Also the composer for the video game Phantom Kingdom.

__[Official Website](http://www.shouta-aoi.jp/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/noboru0811) | [Personal Twitter](https://twitter.com/shouta0811aoi) | [Professional Twitter](https://twitter.com/AOISHOUTAstaff) | [Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/aoishoutaKING)__

Singer and voice actor since February 2011. Used to have a complex about his feminine voice, but he got over it because people liked that type of unique voice.

Ryuunosuke Matsushita in _Kimi to Boku_ was his first anime role. He also sings many insert songs in the same anime. Ai Mikaze from _UtaPri_ series is the role that made him popular. Debuted with the mini-album "Blue Bird" on June 26, 2013.

[Profile](https://vims.co.jp/talent_profile_detail.php?id=7) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaji__official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yuki_kaji_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx2XAGS0FoG9S6r0bhNo2UA)

Kaji has won several awards, including Best Voice Actor at the 12th Tokyo Anime Awards (2013), Best Actor at the 7th Seiyu Awards (2013), and Best Voice Actor at the 36th Anime Grand Prix (2014).

Married voice actress [Ayana Taketatsu](https://anilist.co/staff/101996/) in 2019.

[Website](http://tachibanashinnosuke.com/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/tachibanashinnosuke/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/REAL_1978_TS)

A Japanese voice actor, singer, and narrator. He is also the head of the voice acting agency [BLACK SHIP](https://www.blackship.jp/), which he created together with [Jun Fukuyama](https://anilist.co/staff/95086) after leaving their old agency Axl-One at the same time. As a part of his singing career, he is one of the two members of [Elekiter Round 0](http://www.marine-e.net/sp/er0/).

Married voice actress [Ao Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/95713) on January 1, 2017.

__Non-anime roles:__

- Argenti - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Jusis Albarea - The Legend of Heroes Series (VG)
- Rafayel - Love and Deepspace (VG)

vistlip formed on the auspicious date of July 7, 2007 with members from all over Japan: vocalist Tomo from Fukuoka, Kyushu, Tokyo-born guitarists Yuh and Umi, who also does rap vocals and is responsible for bringing the group together, bassist Rui from Hyogo and Kanagawa native Tohya on drums.
